quote: You had been a paper boy to me all these years - two dimensions as a character on the page and two different, but still flat, dimensions as a person. But that night you turned out to be real.
quote_letters: YOU HAD BEEN A PAPER BOY TO ME ALL THESE YEARS - TWO DIMENSIONS AS A CHARACTER ON THE PAGE AND TWO DIFFERENT BUT STILL FLAT DIMENSIONS AS A PERSON BUT THAT NIGHT YOU TURNED OUT TO BE REAL
